snippet.title: FLINTHOOK Gameplay Trailer! OUT NOW! ❤️⚓️
snippet.description:
FLINTHOOK is OUT NOW! Live the life of space captain Flinthook! Armed with your mighty hookshot, your uncanny slow-motion powers and your trusty blasma pistol, plunder and fight your way through an infinite variety of randomly-assembled spaceships for treasure, loot and fame!

Steam, Playstation 4, XBOX One

http://flinthook.com/
Flinthook on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/401710/



◭ Subscribe to Tribute Games videos: http://bit.ly/TributeGamesYT◭
◭ Pixel art games with a modern twist!◭

For fresh news about Tribute Games studio, visit http://www.tributegames.com
Twitter: @tributegames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TributeGames
Tumblr: http://blog.tributegames.com/
